articles.content: NEW YORK/INDIANAPOLIS (Reuters) -U.S. health authorities, shipping services and hospitals stood ready on Friday to immediately launch a mass-inoculation campaign of unparalleled dimension, as federal… [+5875 chars]

articles.title: Michigan's plan if Pfizer's vaccine is approved for emergency use - 13 ON YOUR SIDE
articles.description: Michigan expects to receive about 257,000 doses of COVID-19 vaccines initially if the federal government authorizes them for emergency use this month, enough...
